duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct daily outreaches to customers through calls, emails, and social media.
Utilize social media to identify, target, and engage prospective customers to develop leads.
Qualify and develop leads from Marketing campaigns, and identify customer needs to present potential products/solutions.
Assist/participate in product demonstrations with Account Executives.
Meet phone call, social media outreach, pipeline development, and qualified opportunity quota goals.
Collaborate with Marketing to research accounts, identify key players, and develop scripts and messages.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Sales, Business, or a related field
